name: Alpheus Public Affairs
goal:
Alpheus Public Affairs is a consulting agency specializing in public affairs, strategic communication and developing relationships with the regulating and legislative authorities.

Based in Zagreb, Croatia, but with developed resource network both in SEE and Brussels.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Digital Europe programme; Multiannual Financial Framework; European Green Deal; Gas PDigital Single Marketackage 2020; Internal Market; Competition; Health Policies; EU Investment Plan
